faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the continental US. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available at checkout. International orders typically arrive within 7-14 business days.

faqs.question: Do you offer free shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on orders over $50. Orders under $50 have a flat $5.99 shipping fee.

faqs.question: Can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your order in the My Orders section of your account.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to over 50 countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by destination and are calculated at checkout.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of delivery for unopened products in original packaging. Opened products can be returned if you're not satisfied, minus a 20% restocking fee.

faqs.question: How do I return a product?
faqs.answer: Log into your account, go to My Orders, select the order, and click Return Item. Print the prepaid return label and drop off at any carrier location.

faqs.question: When will I receive my refund?
faqs.answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return. The refund will be issued to your original payment method.

faqs.question: Are your products cruelty-free?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our products are 100% cruelty-free and never tested on animals. We're certified by Leaping Bunny and PETA.

faqs.question: Do you have vegan options?
faqs.answer: Yes, over 80% of our products are vegan. Look for the vegan badge on product pages, or use our vegan filter when shopping.

faqs.question: Are your products suitable for sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: Many of our products are formulated for sensitive skin and are dermatologically tested. Check individual product pages for sensitive skin labels and patch test before full application.

faqs.question: How do I know which products are right for my skin type?
faqs.answer: Use our Skin Quiz tool on the homepage to get personalized recommendations, or filter products by skin type (dry, oily, combination, sensitive) on our shop page.

faqs.question: What does clean beauty mean for your brand?
faqs.answer: Our clean beauty standard means no parabens, sulfates, phthalates, synthetic fragrances, or harmful chemicals. View our full no-no list on our Ingredients page.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay.

faqs.question: Can I modify or cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Orders can be modified or cancelled within 1 hour of placement. Contact customer service immediately at support@brand.com or call us at 1-800-XXX-XXXX.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift wrapping?
faqs.answer: Yes! Select the gift wrap option at checkout for $5. We'll include a personalized message card and elegant packaging.

faqs.question: How long do your products last once opened?
faqs.answer: Most products last 12-24 months after opening. Check the PAO (Period After Opening) symbol on packagingâ€”it shows a jar icon with the number of months.

faqs.question: Can I use multiple serums together?
faqs.answer: Yes, but apply them thinnest to thickest consistency. Wait 30-60 seconds between applications. Avoid mixing retinol with vitamin C or AHAs/BHAs in the same routine.

faqs.question: Should I refrigerate my skincare products?
faqs.answer: It's not required but can extend shelf life and feel refreshing. Best candidates: vitamin C serums, eye creams, and sheet masks. Avoid refrigerating oil-based products.

faqs.question: How does your rewards program work?
faqs.answer: Earn 1 point per dollar spent. 100 points = $5 reward. Members get early access to sales, birthday gifts, and exclusive offers. Sign up free on our website.

faqs.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
faqs.answer: Click Forgot Password on the login page, enter your email, and we'll send reset instructions. Check your spam folder if you don't see it within 5 minutes.
